name: KUIPER SHIFT
description:
KUIPER SHIFT

Deep in the Kuiper belt, where Sol is one more pinprick in the darkness, the asteroid miner toils away. Some day their contract will end.

Requires a keyboard. Use [z], [x], [c], and the arrow keys. Interact with the console to drive your ship. Carefully approach an asteroid to mine it. Repair your ship and manage resources while you dream. Don't forget to water your plants.

Entry for the Nokia 3310 Jam 3, which requires 84x48 pixels, 1-bit color, and monophonic sound.

Title theme is an arrangement of "Clair de Lune" by Claude Debussey. Uses trix's sfx collection and and krasno's sound font (both from the jam's resources page).
